paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Services
detailsData.content: We handle a wide variety of legal matters related to business law, providing sound legal counsel from an experienced team of San Diego business attorneys.

detailsData.title: Aggressive Representation
detailsData.content: We provide aggressive representation in court, ensuring that our clients' interests are prioritized and protected.

detailsData.title: Cost-Effective Results
detailsData.content: Our firm is focused on efficient and cost-effective results, delivering personalized attention and invaluable legal advice to business owners.

address: 12520 High Bluff Drive, Suite 220, San Diego, CA 92130
valueProp: Our dedicated legal team at Purdy & Bailey, LLP understands the value of a well-stocked toolbox. By focusing on multiple aspects of business law, our San Diego business lawyers bring a breadth of experience to each client's case.
CTA: See How We Can Help You

testimonalData.text: I plan to use them in the future whenever I need legal assistance.
testimonalData.author: M.B.

testimonalData.text: He was upfront, honest, candid and immediately put us at ease in what was an extremely unsettling situation and the first time we had to deal with anything like this.
testimonalData.author: K.B.

testimonalData.text: I found them both to be caring and easy to talk to when navigating the legal in's and out's of my case.
testimonalData.author: S.G.
